databaseConfig.sql: SELECT OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.OD_GETSUJI_SHIME , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.NEN_GETSU , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.MS_USER_ID , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.SEND_FLAG , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.VESSEL_ID , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.DATA_NO , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.USER_KEY , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.RENEW_DATE , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.RENEW_USER_ID , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.TS FROM OD_GETSUJI_SHIME

SELECT OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.OD_GETSUJI_SHIME , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.NEN_GETSU , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.MS_USER_ID , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.SEND_FLAG , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.VESSEL_ID , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.DATA_NO , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.USER_KEY , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.RENEW_DATE , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.RENEW_USER_ID , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.TS FROM OD_GETSUJI_SHIME WHERE OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.MS_USER_ID = :MS_USER_ID

SELECT OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.OD_GETSUJI_SHIME , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.NEN_GETSU , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.MS_USER_ID , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.SEND_FLAG , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.VESSEL_ID , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.DATA_NO , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.USER_KEY , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.RENEW_DATE , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.RENEW_USER_ID , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.TS FROM OD_GETSUJI_SHIME WHERE OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.OD_GETSUJI_SHIME = :OD_GETSUJI_SHIME

SELECT OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.OD_GETSUJI_SHIME , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.NEN_GETSU , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.MS_USER_ID , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.SEND_FLAG , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.VESSEL_ID , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.DATA_NO , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.USER_KEY , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.RENEW_DATE , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.RENEW_USER_ID , OD_GETSUJI_SHIME.TS FROM OD_GETSUJI_SHIME WHERE NEN_GETSU IN ( SELECT max(NEN_GETSU) FROM OD_GETSUJI_SHIME )

INSERT INTO OD_GETSUJI_SHIME ( OD_GETSUJI_SHIME , NEN_GETSU , MS_USER_ID , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES ( :OD_GETSUJI_SHIME , :NEN_GETSU , :MS_USER_ID , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE OD_GETSUJI_SHIME SET NEN_GETSU =:NEN_GETSU , MS_USER_ID =:MS_USER_ID , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE OD_GETSUJI_SHIME =:OD_GETSUJI_SHIME AND TS = :TS
